name: league-stats-app
description: A League of Legends player statistics web application

scripts.client: cd client && HTTPS=false NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm start
scripts.build: cd client && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run build
scripts.install-all: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm install && cd server && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm install && cd ../client && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm install
